game.name: A Dance of Fire and Ice
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A Dance of Fire and Ice는 하나의 키로 간단하게 즐길 수 있는 엄격한 판정의 리듬 게임입니다. 서로 공전하는 두 행성의 완벽한 균형을 깨지 않도록 집중하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Dance of Fire and Ice is a strict rhythm game. Keep your focus as you guide two orbiting planets along a winding path without breaking their perfect equilibrium.
